q1: I like the team Atletico Madrid
a1: Athletico Madrid is an ok team, but not my favorite.
q2: Do they still have Fernando Torres on the team?
a2: No, he's playing in Japan now.
q3: Is this team capable of beating France?
a3: Atletico Madrid is capable of beating France.

a4: Diego Costa is my favorite player on the team.
